skillTree.localised_description: "I had actually sent to buy a unicorn. Made of diamonds. Like, a real live unicorn made of diamonds, very stylish. But they say it can't be done. Unimaginative buggers, the lot of them."

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: Lupio's own demigryph owes his companionship to Lupio and "Big Magpie" nickname to his distinctive black and white coat and attraction towards shiny baubles.

effects.description: Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%
Post battle chance of stealing a magic item: +5%

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: The Goddess of Battle protects Her own.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Magrittan naval prowess accepts very few rivals. Begrudgingly.

effects.description:
Attrition: -33% casualties suffered from high seas attrition
	(all armies factionwide)

Leadership: +5 when fighting at sea
	(all armies factionwide)

Melee attack: +5 when fighting at sea
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Estalians are notoriously fascinated by the gold overseas. Lupio is more interested in the gold over himself.
They stink, and really they don't know any better than living in muddy shacks. Also, something should be done about their wretched windmills.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Infantry: +2 when fighting against Bretonnia
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs. Infantry: +5 when fighting against Bretonnia
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Perfect uniforms and incessant drills, that's the stuff.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +50
	(Lord's army)

Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Perhaps risen from the lowest ranks, this commander is in his own environment when leading mercenary companies, just as a dolphin plays on the waves.
With roots and allies among the most powerful and upright nobility, this Lord doesn't often meddle with unstable mercs. Who heard that.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +3 for all heavy cavalry and other aristocratic units
	(Lord's army)

Base Weapon damage: +2 for all heavy cavalry and other aristocratic units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for all heavy cavalry and other aristocratic units
	(Lord's army)

Base Weapon damage: +4 for all heavy cavalry and other aristocratic units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A commoner was once asked by a foreign recruiter about a band of Estalian mercenaries. Shrugging, he replied that they were "evil men", which was misunderstood as being 'local' for tough troops. Like many mistranslations, it stuck.

effects.description:
All damage: +10% for Adventurers, Royal Guard, Riders and Lancers (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Adventurers, Royal Guard, Riders and Lancers (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: +10% for Adventurers, Royal Guard, Riders and Lancers
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Lupio has secretly concocted the perfect plan to dramatically improve the region's welfare. This requires him to destroy all windmills in the world, particularly those that move by themselves. Despite people telling Lupio those are Giants, they clearly don't know better.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Large: +5 when fighting against Wood Elves, Warriors of Chaos, Beastmen, Norsca, Greenskins and Vampire Coast
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Well, this is straightforward enough.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +2 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for spear, pike, halberd, lance and great weapon units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Oh wait, there's another chapter.

skillTree.localised_description: Even the lousiest commander knows that you need two halves of a pair of scissors.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Duck! Shoot! Duck! Shoot! Shoot- shoot, that was wrong.

Missile resistance: +3% for all melee units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: +6% for all melee units
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: +10% for all melee units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The key is not letting your initiative depend on a lucky die.
It's seldom enough to have only some of your troops to be ready to take a beating. The enemy has their own plans.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +3% for spear, pike, halberd and lance units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +3 for great weapon, hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +6% for spear, pike, halberd and lance units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +6 for great weapon, hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for spear, pike, halberd and lance units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for great weapon, hand weapon and dual wield units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "You kill them before they kill you, sonnie. That's all it is."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Though of course, if they do stab you, you better know how to parry."

effects.description:
Melee defence: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Plus, you better kill them dead with the one shot you have."

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "And to do that, it helps if you put all your weight where it counts."

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +2% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Look, at the end of the day, you may be alive and you better learn from what didn't kill you."

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.
A commander that allows his captains and troops to everything they can put their hands on is either irresponsible, well-adviced, criminally aggressive or all of the above.
"You know you're doing it right when everyone and their mamas are sending people to stab you."
Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This man can easily distinguish between an ancient elven magical sword of implacable might and a piece of shiny iron, which is not so simple when the artifact itself is in that disguise.
Sometimes it is just time to party. The louder, the better.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: Someone might dub it psychotic complex, but who knows what those shadows are plotting? This Lord does.

factionEffects.localised_description: Commoners of Estalia who are far away from the king's collectors consider themselves lucky.

items.colour_text: Reaped during a confusing skirmish against reptiles, elf corsairs and marauders, this ring bears an eerie and intriguing aura over it. Inquisitors never managed to get it off Lupio for investigation.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

item_set.name: The Prince's Greed
item_set.description: "Am I out of touch? No, it's the peasants who are miserly!"

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

items.colour_text: A cloak made of Lustrian gold, with uncertain magic properties. Its known feature is to give Lupio immense satisfaction.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Good handguns are the future of warfare, if only these wretched peasants wouldn't whine so much about having to pay for them.

	(Lord's army)
